---
title: Amplitude APIs
description: Use Amplitude APIs to send and receive data, and extend Amplitude.
---

Use Amplitude APIs to send and receive information and extend Amplitude. 

## Available APIs

<div class="grid cards" markdown>

- :amp-analytics: [Analytics and Data APIs](../api-reference-overview#analytics-and-data-apis)
- :amp-experiment: [Experiment APIs](../api-reference-overview#experiment-apis)

</div>

## More API resources

- [Amplitude Keys and Tokens](/guides/amplitude-keys-guide): Learn about the keys and tokens used with Amplitude. 
- [Find your API Credentials](../find-api-credentials): Learn how to find the API key for your Amplitude project. 

## Official Postman Collection

The [Amplitude Developers Postman profile](https://www.postman.com/amplitude-developer-docs) has a collection of the example requests included in the API documentation, including detailed responses for each call. You don't need a Postman account to browse.

If you already use Postman, you can [fork and run the collection in Postman](https://god.gw.postman.com/run-collection/20044411-88bd70c1-9e00-483c-aaf1-2b7159f9bb2b?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D20044411-88bd70c1-9e00-483c-aaf1-2b7159f9bb2b%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D2ffc735a-10a6-4f54-818e-16c87aeebcd7#?env%5BAmplitude%20API%20Environment%).
